cinderella.Controller.ViewController

Class EntityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinderella.Controller.ViewController.EntityController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VC

    public class EntityController
extends java.lang.Object
implements VC
    Created by Eric and Felix Brandt on 27.10.2015. This Class represents the Controller for one Tool of the application. Structure is described in a .fxml document
